metadata.title: CVE-2018-10935 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the 389 Directory Server that allows users to cause a crash in the LDAP server using ldapsearch with server side sort.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.0.15-1').
